message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. I believe it will greatly enhance your experience and satisfaction. For this exceptional value, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $75. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a discounted rate, considering its original worth is $80. I trust you'll find this offer irresistible. Looking forward to your positive response!
